# activityType

**Instance Property**

The type of the activity object that is expecting the data.

## Declaration

```swift
var activityType: UIActivity.ActivityType? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is `nil` until the user selects an activity. At that time, the value is set and the provider object is submitted to a queue for execution. Thus, you should access this value only after your object’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIActivityItemProvider/item] method is called.

## Accessing the provider attributes

- **item**: Generates and returns the actual data-bearing object.
- **placeholderItem**: The placeholder object you specified at initialization time.
